com.github.wuic.path

Class AbstractDirectoryPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.wuic.path.core.SimplePath
      • com.github.wuic.path.AbstractDirectoryPath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectoryPath, Path
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FsDirectoryPath, WebappDirectoryPath, ZipDirectoryPath

    public abstract class AbstractDirectoryPath
extends SimplePath
implements DirectoryPath

    Abstract implementation of a DirectoryPath. Subclasses just need to implement the buildChild(String) method.

    Since:
    0.3.4
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET

      protected abstract Path buildChild(String child)
      Builds the path corresponding to the given direct child name of this directory.

      Gets the Path corresponding to the given String which should be interpreted relatively to this directory.
